Class RoadDataGetterFMI

A class for getting weather data from Finnish meteorological institute API

Amanda Dieuaide

    Method that fetched data from the API and creates a w3cDocument from it This document will then be used in RoadDataParserXML to set the data in an actual object

    • getDOMDocument

      public static Document getDOMDocument(String queryName, String minX, String maxX, String minY, String maxY, String lat, String lon, String startTime, String endTime, String parameters) throws MalformedURLException, ProtocolException, IOException
      Method that fetched data from the API and creates a w3cDocument from it This document will then be used in RoadDataParserXML to set the data in an actual object
      Parameters:
      queryName - is the type of query (Observed or Predicted values) Location values:
      minX -
      maxX -
      minY -
      maxY - Specific location values for Predicted values:
      lat -
      lon -
      startTime -
      endTime -
      parameters - -> what data the User wants (temperature, windspeed, cloudiness...)
      Returns:
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException
      ProtocolException
      IOException
